comment.author: 86602256@N00
comment._content: Where was the Chinese school? This is in Lethbridge?

comment.author: 23686862@N03
comment._content:
We would love to hear from anyone who might know the location of this school! Our Archivist says:
"There has always been a nagging bit of doubt about whether this photograph was actually taken in Lethbridge. Of course, although the students are Chinese, this is not a Chinese (language) school. These students are likely learning English."
comment.authorname: Galt Museum & Archives on The Commons
